.
s
.
<p>s</p>
.

.
some ->centered text<- in a paragraph
.
<p>some <div style="text-align: center;">centered text</div> in a paragraph</p>
.

.
clearly not a ->centered text definition
.
<p>clearly not a -&gt;centered text definition</p>
.

.
more text that is not centered<-
.
<p>more text that is not centered&lt;-</p>
.

.
text that spans ->multiple
lines<- should not be centered
.
<p>text that spans -&gt;multiple
lines&lt;- should not be centered</p>
.

.
## -> Centered Heading <-
.
<h2><div style="text-align: center;"> Centered Heading </div></h2>
.

coverage
.
*~f
.
<p>*~f</p>
.

clean up init (constructor)
remove icon
